text.p: Define a function isVowel(char) that returns True if char is a vowel ('a', 'e', 'i', 'o', or 'u'), and False otherwise. You can assume that char is a single letter of any case (ie, 'A' and 'a' are both valid).
Do not use the keyword in. Your function should take in a single string and return a boolean.
